What are the genetic changes related to PDGFRA-associated chronic eosinophilic leukemia ?,"PDGFRA-associated chronic eosinophilic leukemia is caused by mutations in the PDGFRA gene. This condition usually occurs as a result of genetic rearrangements that fuse part of the PDGFRA gene with par
